title: I Cannot update to 1.0.08
body:
Hi,

Thank you for this firmware, I have a couple of these (Tuya_Thermostat_r01) and they are working well for me on 1.0.07.

I am trying to update them to the 1.0.08 version. I have `local_ota_index.json` as specified and have confirmed it is being used by z2m. I have the `1141-d3a3-1111114b-tuya_thermostat_zrd.zigbee` present in the images subfolder.

Despite this, z2m says there is no update available when checking these devices.

I have since tried updating my z2m and the configuration from this repo to the 2.0 version however the new `local_ota_index.json` specifies an extra entry for `tuya_thermostat_zrd.zigbee` 

```
    {
        "url": "images/tuya_thermostat_zrd.zigbee"
    }
```

Which gives an error in z2m as this file doesn't exist. What should this file be? A copy of the full name `1141-d3a3-1111114b-tuya_thermostat_zrd.zigbee` or something else?

If I remove the new entry in `local_ota_index.json` I have the same behaviour as the pre-2.0 version, no updates available for the devices.

Thanks again!
author: csutcliff

comments.body:
For an easy upgrade, you need to rename the file `6565-0391-XXXXXXXX-tuya_thermostat_zrd.zigbee` to `tuya_thermostat_zrd.zigbee` and do this every time you want to get the next version of the firmware. And leave the previous entry in **local_ota_index.json**. 

```
    {
        "url": "images/tuya_thermostat_zrd.zigbee"
    }
```

Then you won't need to restart **zigbee2mqtt** every time before updating.
